/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the processing of vocational rehabilitation/employment (VR&E) and home loan claims for IDES participants, including
handling VR&E inquiries from IDES participants
service members' eligibility for the home loan program
handling
VA Form 26-1880, Request for a Certificate of Eligibility
, received from IDES participants
regional loan center (RLC) action upon receipt of
VA Form 26-8937, Verification of VA Benefits
, from a service member
, and
DRAS responsibility for
preparing memorandum rating decisions
, and
responding to a request for an eligibility determination
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K - Special Situations Related to Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section K
